title: Zheng He's expeditions, Indian Ocean, East Africa

content.question: Which of the following is true of the expeditions of Chinese Admiral Zheng He in the early 1400s?

choices.label: He wished to find a new route to Europe in order to participate in European trade.
He sailed to ports on the Indian Ocean coastline, including those in East Africa.
He crossed the Indian Ocean but did not land on the African coast.
He explored unknown regions and seas, though his ships were tiny and supplies inadequate.
He avoided contact with overseas Chinese communities.

content.answer: He sailed to ports on the Indian Ocean coastline, including those in East Africa.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
